attributes.action: Scrap the Nottingham Work Place Levy
attributes.additional_details: We demand that the tax on working people and business is unfair and unjust. The councils priorities should be the widening of the A453 to reduce the many DEATHS and accidents, and not the Tram network. Phase 1 of the tram has proved that it doesn't work, we were promised that phase 1 would pay for phase 2 but the people of Nottingham have voted with their feet.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the City Council.
